comment.body:
So you want to download torrents and exchange info? There are many torrent sites here that exist. The most prominent is a [Play](/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp), a movie site. And if you just want to exchange information, you can setup your own blog using [ZeroBlog](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroBlog) ** (Clearnet) **. People here on zerome would be happy to help you set it up. You could also just post here.

Hope this helps. :D

You must find the sites.
Another site is managed by @[Sirenyc](/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ/sirenyc@zeroid.bit) called [ZeroTV](/1BEJbnufyav7TK23ADTs2Qi2UJeKSGDzw6/) which contrary to Play does TV shows.

You could look at the sites on some public proxies if you really want to browse around some of the many sites on ZeroNet

http://proxy1.zn.kindlyfire.me
